programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred moves on to the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the foremost manufacturing nations. He also visits the worlds first production line in Suffolk.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Trains reflected class divisions with separate carriages for first, second and third class passengers. Yet, seen at the time, they were also bringing people physically closer together. In the early 1800s Britain was clearly divided between upper, middle and working classes. The trains gradually acted as a great catalyst, mixing the country up as people were travelling to regions and places for the first time.

programme.title: Tutankhamun: The Truth Uncovered
programme.desc: What killed King Tutankhamun? Ever since his spectacular tomb was discovered, the boy king has been the most famous pharaoh of all ancient Egypt. But his mysterious death, at just 19 years old, has never been explained. In this BBC One special, presenter Dallas Campbell reveals new scientific research and carries out unique experiments to get to the truth. For the first time, a virtual autopsy of Tuts mummified body reveals astonishing secrets about the pharaoh.

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: Mrs Thatchers victory in the 1979 General Election propels her into power as Britains first female Prime Minister. On the steps of Downing Street she promises hope and harmony but her first two years are characterised by disruption and division.

programme.title: William Nicholson Remembers: Sweet as You Are

In fact some of our favourite meals have been born out of hard times. From tummy fillers like mince and dumplings to hearty Scotch Broths, when the going gets tough we often turn to food for comfort.

programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from south west England must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again. They need to impress a panel of exacting judges: Michelin-starred chef Tom Kerridge, chef and top restaurateur Nisha Katona,.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras
programme.desc: In Namibia, Gordon joins a cheetah conservationist who wants to see if three orphaned cheetahs, which she has raised from a day old, can learn to hunt effectively in the thick vegetation. In Australia, the team put cameras on fur seals to try to see how they hunt their prey and avoid attacks by great white sharks. In South Africa, the team deploy the first ever cameras on wild baboons in an effort to understand why these clever monkeys sometimes raid farmers crops.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public try to make money from their antiques.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Yinka Bokinni, Ellie Leach, Vicki Michelle and Peter Serafinowicz test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East guides us through all the backstage ballroom action, with more couples revealing exclusives on what they have planned this weekend. Plus a trip to the training rooms for the first time to see how some of the other celebrities are coping with their movie-themed dances.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: A road worker is hit by a modified car during a police pursuit. However, when the driver fails to stop, the race is on to track the car down and bring the offender to justice.

programme.title: Jules and Gregs Wild Swim
programme.desc: Jules and Gregs adventure begins on the small island of Barra, the jewel of the Hebrides.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels from the beautiful Pacific coast of Mexico, where he visits the luxurious holiday resorts of Baja California, before crossing the countrys rugged interior. The first stage of his journey ends in the Bahamas where he discovers the hidden menace on the beautiful coral reefs.

programme.title: Britains Nuclear Bomb Scandal: Our Story
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary story of Britains post-war atomic weapons programme, its devastating legacy. The film reveals the full extent of the British governments nuclear tests in Australia and the South Pacific in the 1950s and 1960s.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed catches up with the murdered and banished players to get the scoop on all the backstabbing and treachery that goes on inside the castle. And he welcomes players from series past to give their reactions and expert analysis on the game.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
programme.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBCs range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
programme.desc: Eva Longoria visits Andalusia, the birthplace of flamenco and bullfighting; from jamon iberico to tapas, she savours the iconic flavours of the region.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The Blackpool crew receive reports of a man struggling in the water at midnight. Its vital to get him urgent medical attention.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Examining the issues affecting the lives of people around Scotland.

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: Entrepreneurs get three minutes to pitch their business ideas to five multi-millionaires who are willing to invest their own cash to kick-start the business. After the pitch, the Dragons have the opportunity to ask questions about the venture.

programme.title: Deep Ocean: Kingdom of the Coelacanth
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the oceans depths to uncover the coelacanth - a primeval fish hidden for 400 million years. Its mysterious movements reveal vital clues to lifes journey from sea to land, unlocking secrets of evolution and survival.

programme.title: Deep Ocean: Kingdom of the Coelacanth

programme.desc: Mush-Mush admires Mushpots staff of wisdom. Mush-Mush confidently retrieves Lilits disc from a snake tunnel. Chep struggles with courage on a mudslide adventure. The trio earns the title `The Adventurers. Truff is happy as he has found a necklace.

programme.desc: When a duckling hatches from an egg in Moletown, Moley must care for it until they find its home. While Moley helps care for worms at Dottys Adopt a Worm Rescue Centre, the Gardener sends Squirm to pose as a homeless worm and help him steal Manny.

programme.title: The Scooby-Doo Show

programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the gang arrive at a mountaintop cool school run by none other than famous actor Billy Dee Williams; the gang loses their cool when an angry pterodactyl monster keeps attacking them and the school trying to scare everyone away.

programme.desc: Shaggy competes in a mini golf tournament that is terrorised by a giant metallic clown. / Shaggy and Scooby are camp counsellors when a ghost story comes to life!

Bing happily shows Charlie how to voosh Squeaky instead, but it flies out of his hands and hits Flops tray of snacks! After some encouragement, Bing tells Flop the truth and apologises.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Black joins the Printing Crew. Learn how yellow, cyan, magenta and black work together in printing with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels find out that being in charge is trickier than Duggee makes it look.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels wonder what Duggee is up to. He seems to be looking through a long stick out of the window. Whats that, Duggee? Duggee explains that its a telescope, and hes looking at things far, far away in space!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but thats never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Blueys game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand, until they realise they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are exploring Cheddar Gorge and enjoying its rocky slopes. But Glitch, learning about the towns love of cheese, pays a visit to the gorge in order to share his fondue with the locals. This backfires horribly when he accidentally floods the gorge with the cheesy mixture. Its up to the Go Jetters to rescue the tourists, the sheep and the Grimbots - but will Foz be able to overcome his fear of heights and save a lost lamb?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Scare Owl
programme.desc: When Peter uses a model owl to scare off Old Brown, he ends up scaring the squirrels too!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Numberland Rescue Team take on a series of urgent missions for the Numberblobs.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: M is very hungry so he and his friends make a gingerbread man, but he runs off. They set chase on a flying mat, and a handy map keeps them hot on his trail. Can they corner the cheeky biscuit? This episode introduces the letter M and the words mat, map and man.

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: After a concert at the music festival, Nick returns to the caravan for a spot of lunch - but whats that funny smell? Is it Norman again?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.sub-title: Top of the Pups: Five Speckled Frogs
programme.desc: We sing a calming song about counting frogs with Mrs Weaver.

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella and Lift enjoy making funny honk noises with tubes. They visit Tincy the Spider, who uses terrific tubes to make music with the Playtimers.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula have a lovely time in the park clambering around on the trees. At first it is Sula who needs Bings help to climb up, but when Bing climbs a bit too high he gets stuck and then he needs some help himself.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say cup and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different cups and explore how they look and what they do. We see a pink cup, a sippy cup and even a drippy cup full of Dees paint! We enjoy a flower cup, a flutter cup and a cute little cup full of bubbles.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu takes the class pet home for the weekend.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: The Piggies create a floating cushion for Fiona, who wishes to be on a cloud. But Wilf falls asleep on it, and now they must catch the cloud before it drifts away!

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos watch a pot being made on a potters wheel, and decide to have a go themselves. On the boat, the tea table is in a spin.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friend head to a marina for lots of boating fun. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble has ordered a new inflatable boat to take fishing. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, and Laa-Laa trot and gallop across Teletubbyland pretending to be horses. Children in Tummy Tales help to groom and feed a horse.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies DJ, Holly, Li-Li, Luke, George, Otis and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are bowls which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate bowls inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: While out hillwalking with Mum, Maddie and Triggs meet a new friend who teaches them all about yodeling, an ancient method of communicating over long distances.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the firefighter wants to put out fires and do a big rescue, but when all the firefighters get stuck, who will rescue them?

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Lou wakes up to find himself on a lily pad in the middle of the lake. He freaks out at first, but his Calm Inner Voice comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Nurse Bingo gives Dad an x-ray which reveals he has a cat in his tummy and Dr Bluey has to operate immediately.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: After hearing a strange sound, the Squirrels turn to Duggee to help identify its source. They learn about sound waves, and that you can listen for different qualities in the sounds, such as if its loud, quiet, high or low. Describing the sound can help you work out where its coming from, so Duggee lets the Squirrels close their eyes as they listen to sounds and make their guesses.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a planet with a very thin atmosphere that makes them feel very light, allowing them to make great leaps.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Cucumber performing Cool Under Pressure while trying to not let any obstacle ruin her calm routine.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Harriet shows Timmy and his friends how to make a collage, but Timmy gets glue all over himself and soon the various items that the classmates have collected are stuck all over his fleece.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Today, sisters Iona and Elba make their familys famous shortbread biscuits and throw a picnic with teddy bears. Out in the park, they play at launching rockets into the sky. One of the rockets lands in a stream.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Connor lives in Scotland. He makes a delicious vegetarian haggis, to share with his friends. He serves his tasty haggis with freshly mashed neeps and tatties. As an extra special surprise, Connor has arranged for a special guest to play the Scottish bagpipes as the haggis is served, and his friends have no idea about this special surprise! They are all looking forward to trying the food, but they were not very keen on fresh coriander, which is one of the ingredients.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Amiah-Rae finds out all about some of the smallest underwater creatures - seahorses. Chantelle meets seahorse fans Joss and Gabriel and puts on her wetsuit for an underwater safari.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Imam Ajmal tells us all about how his rehal helps to hold important books and why its so important to him as a Muslim.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its a new day, and Mrs Farrell is checking in with all the children to see how they are. Lucas tells her he is looking for more friends to play with, and there are lots of volunteers! Isla, Otto and Jud bake some delicious tiger ginger biscuits, using coloured icing for roar-some decorations. At playtime, Jud asks if she can play with Lucas, and they have a fun-filled game of chase. The day ends with carpet-time, and Lucas is happy with his new-found friends.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all help other machines! Grace drives a tugboat, shows off incredible refuelling planes and tows a bus in a recovery truck.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `socks and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different socks: stripy socks, spotty socks, long socks and short socks. There are summer socks, cosy socks and toes-y socks. We see some doggy socks, some soggy socks and even meet some super socks.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One, Two, Three and Four are off on a castle-exploring adventure, with a little help from the friends they make along the way. Learn how to make numbers up to 10 by adding with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: When the Alphablocks go on holiday, a trip on a train is the only way to travel - if only the train would travel somewhere.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Wonderblock Go gets everything and everyone moving in Wonderland. When Go lands in Wonderland, she leaps into action, magically making birds fly, flowers grow, instruments play, the rain fall, and the stars shine.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Colour explorer Brown arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour brown with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is wearing his new scent which he has made himself. The Squirrels want to make their own perfumes too. First, they must find their favourite smells so they can extract their essence, then mix them together.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: A famous soul singer is coming to perform in the garden, but no one knows what they look like. Meanwhile, a cheeky little mouse with a great big voice has appeared in the sun house.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit a theme park and ride on a rollercoaster. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble and the Tumble Toys are very tired and need to sleep - except for the puppy!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies become a pop group and perform a pop song. In Tummy Tales, children watch a one-man band playing music and accompany him by playing their own music.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: When a newly orphaned shoebill chick arrives at Safari World, Andy and Jen notice its having trouble drinking water. Andy takes to the skies in his safari-mobile, jetting off to the swamps of Zambia, in Southern Africa, to discover how shoebill chicks drink water. Along the way, he meets a pack of African hunting dogs, complete with adorable puppies.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Mrs Hobbss cat, George, gets locked inside Mrs Hobbss house, giving Waffle a chance to prove himself to Mrs Hobbs. Can he rescue George?

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Tim arrives at Tony Welchs house for a play-date. Tim suggests hide and seek. As he is waiting to be found, Tim hears the doorbell and a boy called Sam arrives.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. However, they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a Geometric Planet, a planet and learn the game Catch the Jack.

programme.title: Octonauts

programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Unguarded Garden

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: It is a lovely day and the Squirrels are outside playing the shape game. Working out which shape goes where is quite tricky.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When Juno the baby hippo gets sticky from tree sap, only a bubble bath will get her unsticky, but the moment she sees Vidas big bathtub, she runs away scared. Vida uses baby hippo steps to get Juno comfortable with the bath, and before she knows it, she loves baths! And shes unsticky.

programme.desc: Evil Pea plans to take over the supermarket by making fake freezy sprinklers!

programme.desc: Big Lizard and Cosima undertake an exciting night-time mission rehoming a friendly slug thats taken residence in Cosimas bedroom!

programme.desc: Felix the pig is stuck on a cliff ledge where not even Mojos tops can reach him. Theyll need to be creative to get Bo up there and save that poor pig!

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Nick hosts the weeks third visit at Impossible Motel in the centre of York, where he offers a range of quirky rooms including `rock star suites complete with hot tubs and an eyebrow-raising dungeon room with a bed on chains.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Bristol, Reni serves up chilled vibes and West African food with the help of her mum! But will her guests find out?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, the Garners help retired airline staff Darren and Tom find a place where they can park their motorhome, their current temporary abode, for good. And the Hamiltons scour the Málaga market for holistic therapist Suzan.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil helps Savannah and Izzy navigate Londons mind-bending market, while Kirsties in Surrey with John, who has moved out of London and hopes to put down roots once again in Surrey. He has a plentiful budget of £1.2 million and a wish list to match.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Ordering a factory-built house was a no-brainer for manufacturing maestro Pete. But, in true self-building style, even a near-finished project brings challenges like a bat out of hell.

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses
programme.desc: Agent Diana is set to look at a Mayfair property that could sell for a staggering £100 million when it is renovated, and there is already a buyer.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celeb Goggleboxers watching some television include Miquita and Andi Oliver, Rylan Clark, Chris Packham, Shaun Ryder and Bez, Annie Mac, Stephen Mangan, Gyles Brandreth, and Lulu.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Milky comes to AandE with possible life-changing injuries after a road crash. Shaun has had a bad parachute landing. And a six-year-old has an unknown object stuck in his throat.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits Trobianos of Great Neck, N.Y., an Italian restaurant that is a half-million dollars in debt; during a confrontation with the owner about the cleanliness of the kitchen and the quality of the food, Ramsay walks out.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil look back on their best transformations of single-storey living, from an unusual bungalow in Croydon to a dated, 70s-style bungalow in Larne.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, Kirstie helps Sadia and Sohail break the shackles of flat-living, while Phils with Freya and Elliot, who are set on exclusive enclaves - in a fast-moving market.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: From the discovery of the old 19th-century wash house to the pepper pot tower library, we revisit some of the Strawbridges best moments at the chateau from series seven of the show.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: In Cumbria George meets Harry who wants to transplant a derelict Victorian railway signal box to his home and turn it into a garden summerhouse. In Derby, 22-year-old wood carver Sophie hopes to transform a VW campervan into a mobile home.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Maggie Aderin-Pocock in Dictionary Corner. Contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug reluctantly agrees to invest his Christmas bonus in an online business., and Arthur tries to outdo the neighbours big wreath.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Dougs cousin Danny has no best man for his marriage, so Doug reluctantly fills in and arranges a bachelor party. Unfortunately Danny doesnt seem to have many friends who want to come.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug arranges a reunion for his high school football team, but is angry when his championship-winning block is attributed to his team-mate Tom, who is now in a wheelchair.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra decides she and Ray should go to see a marriage counsellor. Although Ray is completely against the idea, he quickly changes his attitude when they meet the therapist, Pamela, who instantly takes a liking to him.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Allys teacher, Miss Purcell, overhears Ray commenting about the kids excessive workload, she invites Raymond to address the curriculum review board and gives him a mountain of material for review.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Even though his father is very much alive and well, Ray writes a eulogy for him that winds up in the wrong hands.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: When a Man Loves Two Women
programme.desc: Just as Frasier overcomes his fears about his relationship with Cassandra, Faye returns and upsets the balance in his life.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne becomes engaged to her boyfriend Donny but her excitement is cut short by a psychic vision which seems to suggest that he is not the right man for her. Knowing that Frasier is scathing about her psychic powers, she seeks advice from a more sympathetic source: Niles.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphnes engagement to Donny has Niles in a slump, but Peppy from Cafe Nervosa provides a pick me up, Frasier finds himself focusing on Faye, but he keeps saying `Cassandra, and Martins relationship with Bonnie goes to the dogs.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier jeopardises his relationship by accidentally calling his girlfriend by an ex-lovers name, and Daphne panics after losing a valuable keepsake.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Three previously featured bosses ask employees to go under cover for a second look inside their organisations.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Italy a BandB opens its doors to test guests, while in Spain a woman takes her coach trippers on a catamaran. In France, a family struggle to get a gite renovated, and a couple in Spain find their bar and BandB business seriously short of staff.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Simon OBrien and Max McMurdo travel across the UK to find unique items lost in peoples homes to fix up for a profit. Henry finds a tractor which hasnt run for years.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Maggie Aderin-Pocock in Dictionary Corner. Contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowes helping Claire from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the heart of Mallorcas capital, Palma. Claire has a budget of £190,000 and Craig has five great properties to show her.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Theres delicate demolition at Jonas and Ulrikes village, as a dilapidated church organ gets a makeover. And strict Brexit rules threaten to derail Kates Bulgarian dream.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Martial arts expert Dan hosts the weeks final visit in Southport, where he aims to please with his no-nonsense approach to a classic seaside getaway. The bed and breakfast owners seem less positive about some cleanliness issues.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Bristol, Stance serves a taste of his Lebanese-Persian heritage, and mums the word for the second time this week!

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Málaga, the Hamiltons help over-analytic economists Sally and Andrew choose a dream property using their hearts as well as their heads. Plus: the inaugural Garner Games.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: George Clarkes Homes in the Wild
programme.desc: On New Zealands remote Rakino Island, George explores the off-grid enchantment of a one-of-a-kind home and a house so close to the ocean that the tide feels like a front doorstep.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Ania Magliano asks a stranger about their marital status, Phil Ellis strips to his base layer and Reece Shearsmith destroys a valuable ornament. Throughout it all, Greg Davies expertly maintains order with his usual stern authority.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its Pastry Week... lets hope for no soggy bottoms! Savoury plaits are on the menu, but who will have the judges tongue-tied? And whose gala pie will be their final goodbye?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz: Best Bits
programme.desc: Highlights from the comedy quiz hosted by Jimmy Carr, with Kevin Bridges, Miranda Hart, Vic Reeves, Bob Mortimer, Micky Flanagan, Ruth Jones, Big Narstie, Rob Beckett, Judi Love and more.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon helps out at Jacks Waterfront in St. Clair Shores, Mich., a lakeside restaurant in a popular summer spot.

programme.title: In Flames
programme.desc: After the death of the family patriarch, a mother and daughters precarious existence is ripped apart. They must find strength in each other to survive the malevolent forces that threaten to engulf them.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien revamp and repurpose hidden treasures. They find an electric organ and a vintage oil dispenser in Maggies barns, which are brimming with junk.

programme.title: Kochadaiyaan
programme.desc: Rana, a ruthless warrior, returns to his homeland to avenge the death of his father, who was unjustly put to death by the reigning king of Kotaipattinam.

programme.title: Ek Jaan Hain Hum
programme.desc: A young man is accused of arson and his father considers declaring him insane to save him from imprisonment.

programme.title: Khal-Naaikaa
programme.desc: After her husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

programme.title: What the Fish
programme.desc: A grumpy old woman travels abroad and puts her niece in charge of her house in Delhi, only to return to utter chaos and mess.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: A young man flees India and arrives in Australia seeking vengance for something that started in India.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three men who were raised in different households do not realise that they are brothers.

programme.title: Mohabbatein
programme.desc: The Principal of a prestigious college, Narayan Shankar, decides to rusticate one of his students, Raj Malhotra.

programme.title: Ungli
programme.desc: The story of the Ungali Gang, a group of friends who launch a moral crusade against corrupt police officers and people in power.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe fears losing her latest prospective boyfriend Mike and her self-doubt is not helped by Ross careless comments. Meanwhile, Chandler is in Tulsa on a work assignment, and when Monica surprises him in his hotel room, she mistakenly thinks that he has a sexual fetish for sharks.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Phoebes Birthday Dinner
programme.desc: While Phoebe and Joey wait at a fancy restaurant for their friends arrival to celebrate Phoebes birthday, Rachel is delayed because she is afraid to leave Emma with a babysitter. programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Mike realises he unintentionally upstaged Vanessas announcement, his efforts to make it up to her might cause more harm than good.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Robert are roped in to make a film to celebrate Frank being elected Man of the Year at his lodge, but are shocked to discover none of his lodge friends likes him.

programme.desc: Ray agrees to accompany his mother on a Caribbean cruise after Frank injures his knee.

programme.desc: Rays press pass is refused when he and his brother visit the Baseball Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayors staff competes in a Thanksgiving contest in which the losers must sing a show tune for the press. Guest star: Ed Koch. With Michael J. Fox.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to please the police commissioner by honouring a dead police dog, but Paul and Carter lose the dogs body.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michael substitutes for the mayor on a political talk show, and winds up facing off against Ashley; James, Karen, and Nikki are caught in an office love triangle.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mikes co-workers return from holiday to learn about his break-up with Ashley, and attempt to raise his spirits.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Its Phoebe and Mikes big day, but all does not go to plan. Wedding planner Monica is driving the bride to distraction, New York is hit by its worst blizzard for 20 years, and Joey is taking his role standing in for Phoebes incarcerated father far too seriously. Chandler and Ross are upset that neither of them has a role, until Mike needs to replace one of his groomsmen.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler discover that their prospective adoptive childs biological father may be a `shovel killer, Ross and Rachel get dangerously close when they go to visit her sick father, and Phoebe struggles to teach Joey French for an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel makes the mistake of going for a job interview at a restaurant where her current boss is also dining. Phoebe discovers she can change her name to whatever she likes - Princess Consuela Bananahammock seems the logical choice, until Mike proves that two can play her game - and Joey, upset that Chandler and Monica are moving, is comforted by an eight-year-old.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Rachel makes a startling announcement, Ross secretly schemes to get her former job back for her. Meanwhile, Joey is so flustered by all of the upheaval in his friends lives that Phoebe prevents him from learning about the sudden death of his agent. Monica and Chandler make a stunning discovery after they check out the house for sale next door to their new home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Going Away Party
programme.desc: As Rachel prepares to leave for Paris, the gang throw a farewell party for her. Instead of facing them all together, she takes each of them aside for a private goodbye. One friend is offended when he is excluded. Meanwhile, Monica barks out orders as she packs precisely for her life in the suburbs with Chandler, and they watch closely the pregnant mother of their future adopted child.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The six friends prepare to say goodbye to each other.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where It All Began
programme.desc: An introduction to the gang. After Rachel leaves her Mr Potato Head look-alike fiance Barry at the altar, she moves in with Monica and discovers that independence sucks when you dont have Daddys credit cards to rely on. programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

Captain Ambrose comes from a long line of seafarers, but cant be a sailor due to his seasickness, so he sets up store in a small British town, Sandcastle-on-Sea.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical epic spectacularly re-enacting the heroic efforts of a handful of Spartan soldiers against the full might of the Persian army at Thermopylae in 480 BC.

programme.title: Daddys Home

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: An American oil-rig roughneck travels to Marseille, France, to visit his estranged daughter, in prison for a murder she claims she didnt commit. Confronted with language barriers, cultural differences and a complicated legal system, he soon builds a new life for himself as he makes it his personal mission to exonerate her.

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: A misguided young woman who is desperate for friends and fame fakes a trip to Paris to update her social media presence. A terrifying incident takes place in the real world, which becomes a part of the imaginary trip and offers all she wants.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Lavish rendering of Winston Churchills early life, from his school days, through his adventures in Africa, to his first days in Parliament. It begins with Churchill as a junior officer in India out to make a name for himself. It is suggested that becoming a war correspondent would be a good career move. His colourful, often controversial, reports make him a household name, aiding his passage into politics.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A lovable Catholic priest sets out to retrieve the priceless cross stolen by a thief named Flambeau during a trip to Rome. However, Father Brown is not an ordinary churchman, and the thief meets his match.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: Modest in scale only, this gripping rescue drama reeks of sweat-soaked claustrophobia and suspense. Peter Dawson heads a team of experts, doctors and welders racing against the clock to save a six-year-old boy whos been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: Richard Shelton returns victorious from the War of the Roses only to discover that his father has been murdered.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: American submarine Captain Joe Glass is on the hunt for a U.S. sub in distress in the Arctic Ocean. He soon learns that a secret Russian coup is in the offing, a conspiracy that threatens to dismantle the world order. With crew and country on the line, Glass must assemble an elite group of Navy SEALs to sneak through enemy waters, rescue the kidnapped Russian president and prevent World War III.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.desc: Three outlaws conspire against a cowboy who is escorting the woman he rescued from Comanches back to her husband.

programme.title: Legend Lowdown

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: On planet Pollax IV, Captain Kirk encounters the Greek deity Apollo - not a myth, but a capricious, all-powerful being who wishes once more to be worshipped and adored.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: When someone tries to kill radio newswoman Joy Vance, the station naturally turns to Charlie and co for help. Joy has plenty of enemies and the angels know that one of them is most likely the killer.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Stuntman Colt Seavers tracks and captures bail jumpers on the side.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: Six young outlaws in 1870s New Mexico, led by Billy the Kid, ride out to avenge the death of their mentor, a British rancher murdered by a cattle baron. The tearaways are deputised and told to bring the guilty men back alive, but Billy has other plans.

programme.title: Mackennas Gold
programme.desc: A motley crew of men and women set out in search of a canyon full of gold - pursued by Apaches and the cavalry. A sheriff is entrusted with a treasure map by a dying Indian, which he burns after committing it to memory. His secret holds out a promise of untold wealth, if he can trace the legendary lost canyon, but also makes him the target of ruthless fortune hunters.

programme.title: Deadly Target
programme.desc: A man returns from duty to find that his brother has been murdered. As he hunts for answers, he uncovers a conspiracy that extends deep within the US government.

programme.title: Peripheral
programme.desc: A young novelist faces off against sinister artificial intelligence software.

programme.title: Peripheral
programme.desc: A young novelist faces off against sinister artificial intelligence software.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The fourth visit is The Compton Swan in Newbury, owned by Geoff Jones and Joan McGowan. Expectations are high after Joan reveals she was named Irelands Business Woman of the Year.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is on a house-hunting mission in the Somerset countryside with a keen gardening couple who have £700,000 pounds, and high hopes of enjoying the countys mild climate. programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee travel to four extraordinary locations across Northern Italy, including the countrys most famed antique markets and a dreamy Tuscan villa.

programme.title: Money for Nothing

Upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell and blacksmith Kev Paxton set to work helping Jacqui transform her finds.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the last leg for antiques experts Mark Stacey and Thomas Plant as they travel through Norfolk. With less than £30 separating them the pressures on, as they head to their final auction in Oakham, Rutland.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott search for bargains around Suffolk and Norfolk. Its a cautious start for Irita, but she ends up blowing the lot on, amongst other goodies, a supremely unusual 19th-century automaton. She also finds time to discover Lowestofts local hero from the Great War and how a certain Tom Crisp took to the seas in his wooden fishing smack to fight the dark menace of the German U-boat.

programme.desc: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven, while at Castle Black, the Nights Watch stand behind Alliser Thorne.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: After the shocking developments at the end of Season 5, including Jon Snows bloody fate, new alliances are formed as fates are more uncertain.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations and decides to reminisce about past race days instead.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations and decides to reminisce about past race days instead.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hit man must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. However, when they learn they are being betrayed, the unlikely pair turns into a lethal team, with their double-crossing bosses in their sights.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A headstrong princess is stolen by an evil sorcerer, and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A research scientist becomes the worlds first pregnant man in order to test a drug he and a colleague have designed for expectant women. To carry out the trial, he has an embryo implant, believing that he will only carry the baby for three months - hardly expecting to face the prospect of giving birth.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - are brought together on a day-long detention where they break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Exhibiting Forgiveness
programme.desc: A Black artist finds his path to success derailed by an unexpected visit from his estranged father, a recovering addict desperate to reconcile. Together, they learn that forgetting might be harder than forgiving.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: It Takes Two

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, theres something here for everyone.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: When his wife and children are killed by Florida drug lord Howard Saint, vengeful FBI agent Frank Castle turns vigilante and dedicates himself to wrecking Saints life. He sets up camp in a crummy apartment, but finds his neighbours a little too neighbourly, and they end up involved in his vengeful plan.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Sing is a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alleys residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: It is time to protect the Earth from the scum of the universe as we walk through how to join the Men in Black, learning from agents Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, and more.

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. programme.title: Die Alone

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
